decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for B1(b) and B1(c) as detailed on the submitted floorplans No.(4) received 13/3/01, and for no other purposes (including any other purpose in Class B of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 4 - No additional floorspace shall be formed within the buildings hereby permitted by means of Mezzanine Floor without prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The car parking accomodation shown on drawing no.2000/2707/P38 revision C and bicycle facilities shown on drawing no.2000/2787/P39 received 14/2/01 shall be provided before the premises to which it relates is occupied and thereafter it shall not be used for any purpose other than the parking of vehicles and bicycles respectively.

Condition : 6 - The development hereby permitted shall not be begun until a scheme for the sound insulation of the proposed external generator has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority. The scheme for sound insulation shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.
description: Change of use of part of mall area to A3 use.
